title: "Misplaced" Heller Article
content:
I have a pretty lame request.   
The other day I noticed a review by Steven Heller of a book called "Beirut's Memory", and I think it was in a major design magazine, but I went back to look for it, and I went crazy searching, but couldn't find it! Help?   
   
hhp
author: hrant

comments.content:
Hrant,   
   
The review spans pp 98-101 of the July/August issue of Print.   
   
Jon
